plot: A family vacation to Itchy & Scratchy Land turns disastrous when the robots malfunction and turn on the tourists.

The Simpsons go to Itchy and Scratchyland,a theme park based on the violent television cartoon, where Bart and Homer are both arrested for annoying actors dressed as Itchy. However when the robot characters turn violent in the manner of 'Westworld' and the staff evacuate,the Simpsons are the heroes of the day by defeating the robots by using camera flash bulbs.—don @ minifie-1
